summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Hair Clippers and Trimers for Men Cordless Rechargeable Hair Cutter Kit Review Date: 2018/08/29 Store: MayBuy Product Description: ['Hair Clippers and Trimers for Men Cordless Rechargeable Hair Cutter Kit'] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Shaving', 'Color': 'Black', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'MayBuy', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 2.99 x 0.71 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'PINK55', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '682500548413', 'Manufacturer': 'Maybuy'} Review Text: There is plenty to like about this kit.

First, I like that it's USB powered. That is a major convenience, especially if using in a professional setting. Secondly, it's got good balance and is ergonomically pleasing. A great feature when you're using is regularly.

My sister, who has been a professional for 20 years, said it was among the sharpest (in a good way!) she's ever used. Obviously this is huge when working on customers and you don't want to pulling hair out when you're trying to cut it.

With the myriad attachments, there's really very little you can't do with it. And best of all, the price is great for what you get. I would recommend this for both home and professional settings.

The battery length isn't great, but it also charges really quickly, so it's simply a matter of being mindful of it. Review Title: Great for home or the salon Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LaClaire Foaming Botanical Facial Cleanser with Enriched Antioxidant Botanicals - Nourishing pH Balanced Face Wash (50 ml/1.65 oz), Made in the USA Review Date: 2018/10/03 Store: LaClaire Product Description: ['A gentle foaming cleanser utilizing natural beneficial antioxidant botanicals to draw out impurities, excess oil and pollutants. Our foaming cleanser removes debris without disrupting skin’s delicate PH balance. Use our cleanser to detoxify, purify and condition the skin’s natural barrier.'] Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Dry, Normal', 'Brand': 'LaClaire', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 5.5 x 1.63 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '891040000682', 'Manufacturer': 'LaClaire'} Review Text: I wanted to love this cleanser, but my first disappointment was the giant box it was wrapped in. It's seemed to be like unwrapping an onion, with a box, then a smaller box, and paper. The bottle is wrapped in tissue paper and unfortunately the cleanser had leaked all over the paper and turned it a dark yellow color. This is a foaming cleanser and when mixed with water, the consistency is rather thick. I suffered from breakouts all over my forehead during the week or two using this cleanser which is a very unusual spot for me to break out. I had some other treatments affecting my hormones at the same time, so I can't say for certain that my skin condition was due to this product alone, but it certainly didn't help. When I switched to using Cetaphil cleanser, the breakouts cleared up almost immediately. Unfortunately this was a pass for me. Review Title: Too much packaging, gave me breakouts Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mr. Pristine Organic Beard Shampoo with Natural Essential Oils for Moisturizing Skin & Hair, 8.5 oz. Review Date: 2020/10/03 Store: Mr. Pristine Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mr. Pristine', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Peppermint', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '5.21 x 2.8 x 2.3 inches; 7.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '627843801832', 'Manufacturer': 'Mr. Pristine'} Review Text: I recently decided to enter my prophetic career by growing out my beard. I've always keep a few days growth, but I finally cut loose and embrace my inner Moses.

A few months into it, I realized a needed something more than a basic shampoo or soap for my beard. I was pleased to try Mr. Pristine's beard shampoo and so far I've been pleased with the results.

First of all, it smells great. None of the scents are overwhelming or powerful. The faint mint is nice and refreshing. Secondly, the lather is fine. I noticed that if I apply some to my hair and work a lather, it's nice and frothy. I then apply to my beard and give it a good cleaning. If I apply the shampoo directly to my beard, the later is noticeably less frothy. I don't know why this is.

At any rate, it's been working well for me and leaves me feeling nice and crisp after a shower. My only misgiving is the price, which is a bit steep for what you get, in my opinion. Review Title: Good shampoo, a bit pricey Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Stamped Glorious Short Hair Extensions Halo Wire Sercet Crown Synthetic Wavy Curly Brown Blonde Bayalage Hairpieces For Women Invisible (16 inch, 16/60) Review Date: 2021/02/15 Store: Stamped Glorious Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Stamped Glorious', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 6.97 x 2.44 inches; 6.74 Ounces'} Review Text: Impressed with the quality of this hair for the price! Not too shiny or fake looking and nice and thick. There are no instructions on how to adjust or wear so there is a bit of a learning curve and you'll need to look up instructions. Once you know how, it is easy to put on and feels very secure. I got the 16T60 color and it is VERY ashy. I have level 9-10 blonde hair that leans more neutral vs ashy and this hair looked almost lavender compared because it is VERY ashy. Definitely recommend for someone with ash blonde hair. Review Title: Impressive for the price! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mane Tame Deluxe Pomade 3.3oz/97mL - Firm Hold, Medium Shine - Made in USA, Water-Based, Combable, Rinses Out Easily, BARBER RECOMMENDED - Best used on dry hair Review Date: 2021/02/26 Store: Mane Tame Professional Men's Grooming Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Dry', 'Liquid Volume': '118 Milliliters', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Brand': "Mane Tame Professional Men's Grooming", 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 2.5 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '851088008163'} Review Text: I have thick and wirey hair so finding a product that works and has hold for my hair is hard to find, but this product delivers! It has a pretty smooth consistency between your fingers and goes on smoothly. I like that it "sets" - not all pomades or gels do and they stay sticky. This actually has holding power on my thick hair but isn't crunchy and stays soft. It has a pretty strong masculine smell which I do like, but it may not compliment your cologne. smells really good but it's pretty strong and masculine that may not work with your cologne. All the great reviews are true - this one is worth a try! Review Title: Has great hold on my thick hair Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Empty Amber Glass Spray Bottles - (4 Pack) 16 oz with Labels Refillable Container for Essential Oils, Cleaning Solutions, Cleaning Products, Hair, Plant Mister, Daily Shower, Gardening or Aromatherapy Review Date: 2021/03/21 Store: AYL Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'AYL', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 7.6 x 7.17 inches; 2.98 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'EmptyAmberGlassSprayBottles 4 Pack', 'UPC': '860005177202'} Review Text: These bottles are wonderful! Nice and smooth, fit perfectly in the hand, and are a great size and not too heavy to hold. The bottles are easy to clean. Nozzles can be disappointing especially when ordering online but I was so pleased that this nozzle sprayed nicely! Sprays nice and and evenly. I make my own cleaning solution and keep it in these brown bottles to keep the essential oils fresh and potent. Have been very happy with these and use them all over my house! Review Title: Perfect size for cleaning solution Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Heyedrate Activated Charcoal Soap Bar and Face Wash | Organic, Vegan, Natural Soap made with Dead Sea Mud and Our Essential Oil Blend (1 Pack (5 Ounces)) Review Date: 2021/06/22 Store: Eye Love Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Eye Love', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus, Coconut, Grapefruit, Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural, Vegan', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 1 x 1 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '850436007827'} Review Text: Finally got around to using this bar and I'm glad I did. It's kind of a small bar, but it's not super lathery, so I suspect will last a while.

It's most definitely an exfoliating bar, so use it with some care or you might scuff your skin up a bit.

I like the aroma and exfoliation. I would definitely buy this one again. Review Title: Nice exfoliating bar! Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Summary of Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Grooming and Personal Care:** Strong interest in grooming tools such as hair clippers and beard products indicates a focus on personal appearance and maintenance. Prefers ergonomic, rechargeable, and USB-powered items for convenience.

- **Skin Care Methodology:** Active exploration of facial cleansers, though experiences vary significantly; preference leans towards natural and organic solutions but seems sensitive to formulation, as indicated by negative reactions to a specific product.

- **Hair Products and Extensions:** Interest in both professional and at-home hair products, including extensions, showcasing a desire for versatility and quality in hair care. Reviews suggest value for money is important.

- **Fragrance Sensitivity:** Preference for mild, non-overpowering scents in personal care products, particularly in hair and beard care.

- **Sustainability and DIY Enthusiasms:** Positive feedback on reusable, eco-friendly containers for creating home solutions suggests a trend towards sustainability and self-sufficiency in personal care and home management.

- **Overall Value and Quality Seeking:** Frequent evaluation of product effectiveness versus price; prioritizes quality and functionality over brand prestige. 

**Conclusion:** This individual's purchasing pattern demonstrates a commitment to grooming, an interest in natural products, and a keen awareness of value, combining practical functionality with personal care preferences.

target_interaction.title: It wasn't for me, but it might be for you?
target_interaction.text:
My 11 year old daughter tried these with her thick long hair in the following styles:

A bun-the hair clip didn't stay tight enough to hold the style
A ponytail- it's very tricky to pull the hair tight and get the plastic clip around the hair.
One of the clips broke because she over stretched it, in order to open it as wide as possible.

She lost interest quickly and rarely uses them now. She prefers a good old fashion rubber band for ponytails.
target_interaction.title_meta: 8PC Lazy Bird's Nest Plate Hairpin Velvet Bird Nest Shaped Hair Clips Expandable Ponytail Holder Hair Loops Nest Plate Hairpin Hair Claw Clip barrette

videos.title: 8PC Lazy Bird's Nest Plate Hairpin Velvet Bird Nest
7PCS  Geometric Retractable Hair Loops Ponytail Holder
